original_text: When the Almighty was yet with me, when my children were about me;
korean_text: 그 때에는 전능자가 아직도 나와 함께 계셨으며 나의 젊은이들이 나를 둘러 있었으며

sentences.original_text: When the Almighty was yet with me
sentences.korean_translation: 전능하신 분이 아직 나와 함께 계실 때

sentences.original_text: when my children were about me
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 자녀들이 내 주변에 있을 때
